description:
Beelzebumon`s sacrifice has allowed everyone to escape Hell`s Field and return to Bright Land. But Apollomon Whispered has also returned, and is preparing to wipe out all of the Kingdom`s Digimon. When Taiki pursues him, Whispered assumes the form of Apollomon to weaken Taiki`s resolve to fight. Has Whispered won, or can Taiki find the strength and courage to fight his friend?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Taiki no Ketsudan! Saikyou no Apollomon o Koero!
Taiki`s Determination! Overcome the Strongest Apollomon!
タイキの決断! 最強のアポロモンを超えろ!
